matches.text: alert("Direct Draw Overlay Mode: It is faster than GDI but only available on ATI Video Card and requires Direct 7 or above.\nIf you have other video cards than ATI, you shouldn't use this mode.");
alert("DirectDraw Video acceleration will be enabled if your VGA card supports Microsoft DirectX 8.1 or later.");
